about_the_game:
Bedroom Battlegrounds takes players into a vibrant and imaginative world, where a simple bedroom becomes the setting for epic turn-based battles. Lead your army of toy soldiers and vehicles against foes, maneuvering across a diverse battlefield of beds, desks, and toy boxes.


Use strategy and wit to overcome enemies, taking advantage of the unique terrain that each room provides. Whether hiding behind a stack of books for cover or climbing up a toy castle for a vantage point, every move counts in this intricate game of strategy.


Welcome to Bedroom Battlegrounds - where the imagination comes alive, and childhood games turn into grand strategies!

At your disposal, you have a wide range of units, each with their own set of characteristics and abilities.

Infantry:

Cheap and versatile units, creating the core of your army.

Vehicles:

Fast and armoured, able to move your troops around the battlefield in a blink of an eye and deal heavy damage.

Buildings:

Supporting your units and protecting your home ground.

What's your plan to outsmart your opponents and become a champion of the battlegrounds?
